meta.title: Coffins & Caskets - Traditional & Eco-Friendly Options | Barringtons
meta.description: Wide range of coffins and caskets from traditional solid wood to eco-friendly options. Personalised designs available. Liverpool funeral directors.
meta.keywords: coffins Liverpool, caskets, eco coffins, wooden coffins, funeral coffins

intro.title: Our Coffin Range
intro.subtitle: Barrington's can offer a wide selection of coffins to suit your preferences and budget. We can fully advise and discuss materials, design and ideas to fulfil a simple last request or create a strong reflection of someone's life.

options.title: Traditional Wood
options.description: Classic veneered and solid wood coffins in oak, mahogany, and pine with various handle and lining options.

options.title: Environmentally Friendly
options.description: Biodegradable options including willow, bamboo, and cardboard for natural burials.

options.title: Personalised Designs
options.description: Custom designs, photo wraps, and themed coffins to celebrate individuality.

cta.text: To see more of our range, either visit our
cta.endText: and we'll email you our brochures.
